name: Coffee&ConversationwithCoachKincaid
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Do you need that one great inspiring success strategy, story or motivating leadership lesson each day to help you conquer the day? Then this is the flash briefing for you! With 20+ years developing others in the corporate world and educated in strategic leadership, Coach Kincaid will share a joyful, engaging and influential story or lesson from leaders throughout the ages to help you transform your career, your health, your life and, most importantly your inner joy as you strive to accomplish your goals and dreams in life. 

Each week, Stephen will take you through the big ideas from various books, research articles or other content to bring the latest thoughts and information on how YOU can improve yourself, your life and the life of others. Enable this Alexa Skill today!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
